# fillTexture

**Instance Property**

The texture used to fill the shape.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var fillTexture: SKTexture? { get set }
```

```swift
var fillTexture: SKTexture? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `nil`. If a fill texture is specified, the shape node is rendered using that texture blended with the [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKShapeNode/fillColor].



## Filling a Shape

- **fillColor**: The color used to fill the shape.

items.description: The color used to fill the shape.
